Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory676.jpg'}
{3: 'The door opens and combines once more.'}
{3: 'Compared to how they entered without thought last time, the four of them are much more cautious.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The metal walls are covered in a thin layer of frost. Trojan lightly knocks it with her weapon and inspects the shard that had fallen to the ground.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Nothing unusual about this. It just froze due to the low temperature.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lena', 3: 'Looks like the theme here is winter wonderland.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After inspecting the area, they find a refrigeration unit as expected.'}
{2: 'Lena', 3: "There's no control panel so we'll have to shut it down by force.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'By force, you mean...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lena draws her bow and aims for the air outlet...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Stop! Please stop!'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A hoarse voice suddenly yells out. Lena immediately changes her target and aims toward the origin of the voice.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Please don't break that device, it'll destroy the exhibits in the museum!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The four members of Iris Warbler finally take a look at the mechanoid that confronted them.'}
{2: '???', 3: "D-don't hurt me, I'm just the messenger...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if to authenticate its identity, the mechanoid crouches down. The parts on its body start to expand.'}
{3: 'It slowly builds a device they have never seen before, and a light flashes on top of it.'}
{3: 'The "light" slowly forms into a human shape, or more precisely, it looks like a hologram of a human.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Greetings, guests from Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The voice is not emitted from the device, but the speakers in the exhibition hall...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: 'Hello, who are you?', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "I am this city's... temporary administrator. I am responsible for the operation of mechanoids in this city.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: 'Then those statues...', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Those are security guards who protect these exhibition halls, it was not my intention to attack you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: 'Mr Administrator, I...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Let me introduce myself, I'm Cervantes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'And... you must be Ayla?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Cervantes' hologram stops in front of Ayla and inspects her."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "You can say that. Since you're standing here, that means part of my plan succeeded.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Part of your plan... succeeded...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: 'Wait, the signal General Wells mentioned...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'No need to fret, I just wanted to invite you to the city as guests.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Was that the "welcome committee" just now then? You guys sure are passionate.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Cervantes does not explain nor does he seem to want to explain, he continues staring into Ayla's eyes before glancing at the other members."}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Ah, that really is...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: "Sica quietly sneaks over to Lena's side as Cervantes keeps sizing them up."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: 'Lena, can you determine where he really is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lena', 3: "If you give me that robot, then I may be able to trace where he's sending the signals from.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'However, as they are plotting in whispers, Cervantes suddenly directs the conversation to them.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Sorry, but please refrain from doing that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "I come in peace. Of course, I wouldn't ask you to trust me completely.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'The situation of the city is currently a bit complicated, although I do not disapprove of it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'If you really mean us no harm, then please answer our questions honestly.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What is your plan?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Under the brim, the pair of red eyes look over to Ayla.'}
{3: 'As if in contemplation, Cervantes only speaks after a while.'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'For now... I just hope for you to enjoy the exhibitions in this museum.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Especially you, Ayla of the WGAA.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla is startled by his unexpected answer, just as she is about to ask more in-depth, Cervantes already answered her.'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Look at it as a request from a "fellow artist."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "I've buried all that I have seen, lost and experienced here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'And that of what this city named "Constellia", an unfinished city that only exists in a fantasy, had experienced at the end of the Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "I'm sure the WGAA is interested in this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I hope that you can give me an answer after seeing everything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Also, I want to see how well this squad can operate, it will be a truly valuable experience.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Now, please follow this mechanoid and enjoy the exhibition.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "With that, Cervantes' hologram disappears, leaving them with an empty exhibition hall and the mechanoid who was reconstructing itself."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Exhibition Mechanoid', 3: 'Please follow me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lena', 3: 'Follow you... Is this a joke?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Let's do as he says for now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lena', 3: '...Are you serious?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'One of the reasons for the founding of Iris Warbler is to retrieve information about the Golden Age civilization.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'If what Cervantes says is true, and he knows what happened to Constellia... then we need the information from him.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "Hm... If we don't do as he says, it may lead to bloodshed like earlier again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: "We're already not a squad specializing in battle... We should act carefully.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "And these exhibitions look quite interesting, there's a need for further investigation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lena', 3: 'Fine... Is everyone at the WGAA like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lena', 3: "But if this is what Commandant and Captain decide, then I don't object.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lena', 3: 'We just have to be careful...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Whoa! Is that a replica of the largest Moses-class icebreaker from Murmansk Port back in the Golden Age...? Or...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Before Lena could even finish her sentence, Ayla's attention is already fully captivated by the exhibits in the hall."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: 'W-wait, Ayla, we need to maintain formationâ€”', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Let's be the ones on guard and leave the investigating to them.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lena pinches the bridge of her nose as she tries to soothe this headache induced by the recklessness while she follows them.'}
